snippet: The size of Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s war chest exceeds what he spent on his entire 2010 campaign, and it highlights the challenge that a Republican opponent would face.
abstract: Campaign team for Gov Andrew M Cuomo reports he has already amassed more than $33 million to finance his re-election bid for second term; size of Cuomo’s war chest exceeds what he spent on his entire 2010 campaign, and highlights challenge that Republican opponent could face.
lead_paragraph: The size of Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s war chest exceeds what he spent on his entire 2010 campaign, and it highlights the challenge that a Republican opponent would face.

headline.main: Cuomo Has Raised Over $33 Million for Re-election Bid
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Has Raised Over $33 Million for Re-election Bid
